title: Store: Adding Product Variants
body:
Store: Adding Product Variants¶

A product can vary in a number of ways - for example, in color or size.
These properties make a version unique from other variants of the product. This can be expressed when you are creating a product through Variants.
To add variants of a product, you will need to create a new product (you are not able to retroactively add variants). Refer here if you are having trouble reaching this point.

  1. Select There are multiple variants of this product with different options (color, size, etc)

  2. Click + Add Option

  3. Enter a title (e.g. Color)

  4. Enter the values and enter each by pressing the return key, the tab key, or “,” (e.g. Red, Green, Blue, White, Black)

  5. Click Done

  6. Repeat steps for all desired variants

  7. Click to edit a product variant

  8. Click to delete a product variant
